list.name: Ninja Bag
list.desc: A set of tools to assist developers with their daily tasks such as cors-proxy, thumbnail generator, URL shortener, and more, all free and open source ([Github](https://github.com/mohamed17717/ninja-bag) | [Demo](https://ninja-bag.devmhmd.com/)).

list.name: Spot Review
list.desc: Inspired by a function in the InVision design program that enables designers to share their work with clients and let those clients assess it in a precise location for quicker ([Github](https://github.com/mohamed17717/spot-review) | [Demo](https://spot-review.devmhmd.com/)).

list.name: Youtube Audio Stream
list.desc: Got annoying from Youtube application which can't run audio in background so i created this solution ([Demo](https://yt-audio.devmhmd.com/)).

list.name: GeTorrent
list.desc: find torrent (with different qualities) and subtitle (arabic & english) for the movie in one place. its resources are `https://yts.fm/` and `https://1337x.to/` ([Github](https://github.com/mohamed17717/geTorrent) | [Demo](https://getorrent.devmhmd.com/)).

list.name: Echo Tester
list.desc: If you want to check if something breaks while you're developing (in case you don't have tests written) or if you want to mimic a scenario each time you make a change, you may use a Django app that keeps track of requests that come to your project and runs them whenever you need to. ([pypi](https://pypi.org/project/django-echo-tester/)).

list.name: Keyboard Actions
list.desc: Keyboard-actions is a package that allows developers to make their websites accessible from keyboard, which will give their users away better experience ([npm](https://www.npmjs.com/package/keyboard-actions)).

list.name: Auto Dark Mode
list.desc: Auto-dark-mode is a package to apply dark mode in any design. with just one line of code. Also give fully control to change the theme, posision and more. ([npm](https://www.npmjs.com/package/auto-dark-mode))

list.name: Like Reddit API
list.desc: Fully functional forum backend api that can be integrated with any frontend, there are many features for the admin to manage his forum and user to have a good experience ([Github](https://github.com/mohamed17717/Like-Reddit-Backend-Clone)).

list.name: Scraping Helper
list.desc: Classes that saves time doing repeated stuff in scraping process ([Github](https://github.com/mohamed17717/scraper-helper)).

list.name: Changes Log
list.desc: Make the clients following to the project changes ([Github](https://github.com/mohamed17717/changes-log)).
